tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Doctor heard us out and explained the issue well. My daughter is feeling much better. Thank you doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor was very friendly, approachable and my son warmed up very quickly to him. We went to him after my kid sprained a muscle and was pointing to his hand and crying. Other than that, doctor also advised on his developmental milestones, behavioural issues,etc.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Shashidhar is very calm in understanding the complaints first and then, suggest the necessary steps along with the medicines. He tries to understand the problems in details so that, the diagnosis could be easier and better. I have a very good experience with him. Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: ********* ******* Felt so relaxed after talking to hin, he talks less but but he gives exact solution to the problem concerning toddler  and answer all queries and gives proper explanation.  Found to be patience too!

tags: None
review: Doctor was friendly and approachable person we consult for my son was suffering with cold and cough gave better treatment and advised regards his health development and all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor understood my child’s health pattern in the first visit and now is my permanent go to doctor for my kid’s health.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Had a good review from the doctor. Helped me with all my doubts and gave a good explanation for the children's health. Thank you

tags: None
review: My 11 months old daughter had cold and chest congestion and Dr able to guide us with the right medication and also necessary care. Baby was lot better next day. I am happy about the consultation and wish the Dr great success. thanks you.

tags: None
review:
Expected the doctor to be warm with the kids. The doctor could have explained the issue well.
Suggested too many medications for a small kid
reply_text: Thanks for your feedback on the Sunday afternoon consultation

tags: None
review:
**** **** ************* 
He won't suggest more medicines and more vaccines
Will check baby's milestones very clearly on every visit
